function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagion due to changing spatial patterns and requirements in the post pandemic era.","Impact":"Potential for a surge in contagious diseases if spatial adjustments do not consider distancing and hygiene measures.","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible spatial designs and hygiene protocols to accommodate new living and working patterns.","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring occupancy, touchless technology for fixtures and appliances.","People":"Residents, workers, visitors.","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, employers, building owners, facility managers."}]}
